column5: A few From last week.  Alot of Fun and hungry fish!!!
Beauty fish!!!  Some great pictures there too!
Sweet. Nice fish. What did you catch them on?
Sweet fish Stonefly...Great pics too.  Congrats

We used mainly Roe, Fresh and Garlic, , grubs, little red wiggler worms, fly/jigs,... in that order.  That last Hen was extra special as she got 10' into a log Jam half way through the fight and I pulled Her out.  By far my most fun of the day!!!
Some beauties there matey... and top pics, great looking stream... well done
Looks like a nice day out on the river!!!  Congrats!  Can't beat nice weather, a good looking stream and steelhead
Great job Stonefly Looks like you had them dialed in!!!  Great report and pics Thanks for sharing Leechman
